actions.name: Jammer
actions.description: You are capable of emitting enough electromagnetic interference that you can disable the signals sent and received by electronic devices. This action can be passively sustained while out of combat, but within combat requires a Complex Action per round to maintain.

system.description: You are capable of emitting enough electromagnetic interference that you can disable the signals sent and received by electronic devices. This action can be passively sustained while out of combat, but within combat requires a Complex Action per round to maintain.
